headline: Is Vistra Corp. (VST) Among Billionaire Dan Loeb’s Best Stocks with Strong Upside Potential?
summary: Third Point Management holds $242,262,500 worth of Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) shares, representing 3.18% of its portfolio. The stock is included in our list of Billionaire Dan Loeb’s 10 Stocks with Huge Upside Potential. On October 3, 2025, BMO Capital increased its price target on Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) from $229 to $236, maintaining an “Outperform” rating. […]
